name: Diluc
title: Dark Side of Dawn
description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

charged.1: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
charged.2: At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Performs a forward slash that deals <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro>.
description.2: This skill can be consecutively used 3 times.
description.3: Enters CD if not cast again within a short period.
description.5: The slashes represent the values that Diluc holds dear: one for justice, one for courage, and one for duty.

description.0: Releases intense flames to knock back nearby opponents, dealing <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro>. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro> to all opponents in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro>.
description.1: The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with <pyro>Pyro</pyro>.
description.3: The only reason to walk in the darkness is to light it up. Behold, that fleeing light in the dead of night is the herald of the coming dawn.

description.0: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.
The Pyro Infusion provided by Dawn lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus during the duration of this effect.
Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.
Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.
When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.
description.1: This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

description.0: Increases the Level of Searing Onslaught by 3.
Casting Searing Onslaught in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.
description.1: 2s after casting Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

constellation6.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark

description.0: After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.
description.1: Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.
